summary: A group of passengers plot their escape off a haunted ship to hell.
cast: Antonio Sabato Jr.|Deanna Russo|Nicholas Irons|P.J. Marino|Adrian Neil|Julian Berlin|James Patric Moran|Cary-Hiroyuki Tagawa|Hristo Mitzkov|Tanya Kozhuharova|Vlado Mihailov|Zhasmina Toskova|Georgi Chapkunov|Svetlozar Popov
title: Viaje fantasma
